      • convertRole

        protected String convertRole(String cmRole)
        Converts a CM role to a Sakai role.
        Parameters:
        cmRole - The role according to CM
        Returns:
        The role to use in a Sakai site or group, or null if the CM role should not be expressed as a role in a Sakai site or group.
